name: TestFlight boarding
description: A simple web page to register as beta tester for a TestFlight app

ITC_APP_ID.description: The App ID of your app from iTunes Connect, to which the tester will be invited.

ITC_GROUP_NAME.description: Optional: You can add the tester to a tester-group. Will be `Boarding` by default.

ITC_TOKEN.description: Optional: Set a password to protect your website from random people signing up.
